description: After five years of running with forcing as in the esm-yr2010-control the CO2 emissions are fixed at zero; all other forcing fixed at 2010 level (part of the CDR-yr2010-pulse experiment).  All anthropogenic, solar, and volcanic forcing. Anthropogenic forcing includes aerosol emissions, non-CO2 greenhouse gas emissions, and land use changes.  CO2 concentration calculated (i.e. emission driven).
long_name: branches from esm-yr2010CO2-control with zero emissions

requirements.description: Run from 2010 for a maximum of 5000 years.
requirements.label: 2010-7009 5000yrs max

requirements.canonical_name: 2010 CO2 emissions for 5 years then zero CO2 emissions
requirements.description: CO2 emissions (as used from 2010 onwards in the esm-yr2010CO2-control experiment) held at 2010 levels for 5 years then reduced to zero for the remainder of the simulation.
requirements.keywords: CO2, carbon dioxide, emissions, 2010, yr2010CO2, zero
requirements.label: 2010 CO2 emissions for 5 years then zero CO2 emissions

requirements.description: Global annual mean 2010 concentrations for non-CO2 long-lived greenhouse-gases, including CH4, N2O, HFCs, PFCs, SF6, several ODS, and NF3 to serve as input for the CMIP6 Historical simulations.
requirements.label: 2010 Non-CO2 Well Mixed GHG

requirements.description: Apply 2010 mass mixing ratio fields at 1x1 degree resolution for main aerosol components (sulphate, black carbon, organic carbon, nitrate, sea salt, mineral dust),  along with effective radius per species.
requirements.label: 2010 Aerosol Forcing

requirements.description: Apply the global gridded land-use forcing datasets for 2010.  This new generation of “land use harmonization” (LUH2) builds upon past work from CMIP5, and includes updated inputs, higher spatial resolution, more detailed land-use transitions, and the addition of important agricultural management layers.
requirements.label: 2010 Land Use

requirements.description: Apply 2010 stratospheric aerosol concentrations from the stratospheric aerosol data set (SADS Version 2)
requirements.label: 2010 Stratospheric Aerosol

requirements.description: 2010 ozone concentrations encompassing both the stratosphere and the troposphere and a stratospheric water vapour concentration.
requirements.keywords: 2010, stratospheric, ozone, water vapour, O3, H2O, concentration
requirements.label: 2010 O3 and Stratospheric H2O Concentrations

requirements.description: 2010 solar irradiance. The standard solar forcing dataset recommended for usage is the solar reference scenario dataset which consists of historical reconstructions (1850-2014).  Includes total solar irradiance, F10.7 cm solar radio flux, and spectral solar irradiance for 10-100000 nm range.
requirements.keywords: Solar Forcing, 2010, Solar, Spectral Irradiance, SSI, TSI
requirements.label: 2010 Solar Irradiance Forcing

requirements.description: 2010 solar particle forcing. For models with interactive stratospheric chemistry.  Proton forcing: HOx and NOx production by solar protons. Electron forcing:  Kp- or Ap-index to describe ionisation from electron precipitation in the lower thermosphere and upper mesosphere. Cosmic ray forcing:  ion-pair production by galactic cosmic rays.  CMIP6 models that do not have interactive chemistry should  prescribe the CMIP6 recommended ozone forcing data set.
requirements.keywords: Solar forcing, 2010, Particle forcing, proton forcing, electron forcing, cosmic ray ionisation
requirements.label: 2010 Solar Particle Forcing

requirements.description: Initialisation from the esm-yr2010CO2-control simulation in the year 2010.
requirements.label: 2010esm-yr2010CO2-controlInitialisation

requirements.description: Use a coupled Atmosphere-Ocean general circulation model with biogeochemistry
requirements.keywords: AOGCM, BioGeoChemistry, AOGCM-BGC, Atmosphere-Ocean General Circulation Model
requirements.label: AOGCM-BGC Configuration
